title: How can I update the mobile number linked to my UNOready GCash by UNOBank account
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [How do I link my #UNOready@GCash to the UNO Mobile app?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40566197326617-How-do-I-link-my-UNOready-GCash-to-the-UNO-Mobile-app)
- [What are the fees or charges for pre-terminating my #UNOReady@GCash by UNO Bank time deposit?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40565683940761-What-are-the-fees-or-charges-for-pre-terminating-my-UNOReady-GCash-by-UNO-Bank-time-deposit)

- [How can I make a deposit to my #UNOready@GCash by UNOBank account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/15033961550745-How-can-I-make-a-deposit-to-my-UNOready-GCash-by-UNOBank-account)
- [How can I withdraw from my #UNOready@GCash by UNOBank account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30243695073305-How-can-I-withdraw-from-my-UNOready-GCash-by-UNOBank-account)

- [How can I update the mobile number linked to my #UNOready@GCash by UNOBank account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/15034906048281-How-can-I-update-the-mobile-number-linked-to-my-UNOready-GCash-by-UNOBank-account)
- [How do I close my #UNOready@GCash by UNOBank account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/30243978324377-How-do-I-close-my-UNOready-GCash-by-UNOBank-account)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

To change the mobile number linked to your #UNOready@GCash by UNOBank account, please [change the mobile number registered to your GCash account.](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/9059222758041-I-want-to-update-my-mobile-number-registered-to-my-GCash-Account)

Make sure your new number is [fully verified](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account#h_01FPYEDSZ597DXA7JF5NWD6PBC) then [click here to ask for help.](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=360000706713&ind=normal&tf_360023219534=gsave__i_want_to_change_my_mobile_number_in_gsave.) A customer service representative will contact you in **1-2 business days.**

Once your GCash number is updated, call UNOBank's Customer Happiness team at **(02) 8811 8866** or **+639190599866** to update your mobile number in UNOBank.
